headline: Connect to
caption: Only interact with dApps that you trust! Please confirm it's the correct URL and that it's secure (HTTPS).

noAccount.headline: No dApp account set
noAccount.caption: There is no dApp account set in $t(common:appName). Switch to the full size $t(common:appName) app and create or import a wallet.

cip30.headline: DApp Connector (CIP30)
cip30.caption: Allows reading your balance and prompting to sign transactions. You'll be able to review a transaction before signing.

cip104.headline: Account Public Key (CIP104)
cip104.caption: Allows export of account public key. Please note that this will allow DApp derive any address for connected account.

allowlist.label: DApp Allowlist
allowlist.caption: The list of websites/dApps that are allowed to connect to this $t(common:appName) app.

confirm.label: Remove Site Access
confirm.message: Confirm removal of {{cip}} access for site with url: "{{origin}}"
